techniqueRules: Bloom turmeric and onion base slowly for depth.
Use saffron water near finish for aroma.
Balance sweet-sour with pomegranate or citrus when needed.
substitutions: No dried lime -> lemon zest + mild vinegar
No pomegranate molasses -> reduced cranberry + splash vinegar
donts: Do not over-spice with chili heat
Do not skip balance between sour and richness

snippets.text: Persian comfort should be aromatic, balanced, and built around shared rice-and-stew service.
Weeknight Persian profile can simplify steps but should keep saffron aroma and onion depth.
Traditional herb-forward profile should layer parsley, cilantro, and fenugreek-like warmth.
